verbs.description: People [V: are] dragging President Donald Trump all over the internet for firing off a bonkers tweet blasting a federal judge 's decision to send his former campaign chairman Paul Manafort to jail until the start of his trial .

[ARG0: People] are [V: dragging] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: all over the internet] [ARGM-CAU: for firing off a bonkers tweet blasting a federal judge 's decision to send his former campaign chairman Paul Manafort to jail until the start of his trial] .

People are dragging [ARG0: President Donald Trump] all over the internet for [V: firing] off [ARG1: a bonkers tweet blasting a federal judge 's decision to send his former campaign chairman Paul Manafort to jail until the start of his trial] .

People are dragging President Donald Trump all over the internet for firing off a [ARGM-ADJ: bonkers] [V: tweet] blasting a federal judge 's decision to send his former campaign chairman Paul Manafort to jail until the start of his trial .

People are dragging President Donald Trump all over the internet for firing off [ARG0: a bonkers tweet] [V: blasting] [ARG1: a federal judge 's decision to send his former campaign chairman Paul Manafort to jail until the start of his trial] .

People are dragging President Donald Trump all over the internet for firing off a bonkers tweet blasting a federal judge 's decision to [V: send] [ARG1: his former campaign chairman Paul Manafort] [ARG2: to jail] [ARGM-TMP: until the start of his trial] .
